To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private MovingAverageConvergenceDivergence _macd;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_macd = MACD(symbol, fastPeriod, slowPeriod, signalPeriod);

// In OnData()
if (_macd.IsReady)
{
    var fast = _macd.Fast.Value;
    var slow = _macd.Slow.Value;
    var signal = _macd.Signal.Value;
    var histogram = _macd.Histogram.Value;
    var current = _macd.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.macd = self.MACD(symbol, fastPeriod, slowPeriod, signalPeriod)

# In OnData()
if self.macd.IsReady:
    fast = self.macd.Fast.Value
    slow = self.macd.Slow.Value
    signal = self.macd.Signal.Value
    histogram = self.macd.Histogram.Value
    current = self.macd.Current.Value
